pilots.name: Stalgasin Hive Guard

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.text: Designed for the unique physiology of Geonosian pilots, Nantex-class starfighters are capable of maneuvers that would rip most ships—and pilots—apart.

pilots.name: Sun Fac

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Archduke’s Enforcer
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Berwer Kret

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Hive Guard Captain
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, each friendly ship with [Calculate] on its action bar and a lock on the defender may perform a red [Calculate] action.

pilots.name: Chertek

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.caption: Opportunistic Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: Gorgol
pilots.caption: Handy Engineer

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token and choose a friendly ship at range 1-2. If you do, it gains 1 tractor token, then repairs 1 of its faceup Ship trait damage cards.

pilots.name: Petranaki Arena Ace

shipAbility.name: Pinpoint Tractor Array
shipAbility.text: You cannot rotate your [Single Turret Arc] to your [Rear Arc]. After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 tractor token to perform a [Rotate Arc] action.

pilots.text: The Petranaki Arena is a massive edifice on Geonosis that was a key site in the first battle of the Clone Wars.
